name: Personal Tweet Me Button
author: Smartersoft

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Install and activate the plugin in wordpress
  2. Go to ‘Widgets’
  3. Put the Tweet Me widget somewhere you would like it to appear.
  4. Give in the title for this widget
  5. Typ the default twitter acount
  6. Choose if it should use the default twitter account all the time, or if it should use the authors twitter account if possible,
sections.faq:
Frequently Asked Questions

Where should I put my personal twitter account?

Go to any users profile page. In the admin menu.
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • Tested the plugin on the latest version of WordPress (3.5.1) and updated the Read Me file
  • Renamed the plugin file to functions.php

1.2

  • Added horizontal/vertical/none count switch. Now you can also set the way the tweet count is shown.

1.1

  • Added the possibility to tweet from the post edit screen.

1.0

  • First public release
sections.description: Adds the official tweet button, to your site as a sidebar widget. You can use a twitter account for the entire site, or use personal accounts per author.
